creator: Mike
title: My favortie movie of all time
content: A fantastic film that makes you question everything you thought you knew about reality. The speical effects still hold up over 2 deacdes after it premire

creator: Lucy
title: The worst piece of cinema I've seen in my life
content: This so called comedy did not make me laugh once but instead made me want to bury my head in a pillow in embarassment. Unless you have a twelve year old boy's sense of humor I don't recommend anyone to waste their time with this sad excuse of a film

creator: Jake
title: An animated comedy that's fun for the whole family
content: I watched this fim with my son and we both cried tears of laughter. It's filled with clever jokes that are funny for all ages

title: A great conclusion to an overall dissapointing trilogy
content: While the movie does a great job of concluding the prequel trilogy it still suffers from the same problems that the previous movies had like cheesy dialouge and a logically inconsistent plot
